sentence: The location was excellent and close to numerous shops restaurants
Plus bacon eggs and other hot breakfast items
The bar staff was amazing and its truely a hidden gem
I enjoyed using it on lunch one day
I walked across the street for every meal as there were about a dozen eating options plus a movie theater
We decided to make The District our stop for dinner before a big event this past weekend
We were celebrating my daughters birthday and dined at The District the hotels restaurant
The lobby was airy light and spacious and even features a popular complimentary candy bar
The hotel was centrally located to Chase Field and plenty of restaurants
The meeting rooms are spacious and we never lacked for delicious food including great snacks during breaks
It is pretty much in walking distance to any downtown venue or restaurant you are headed to including Margret T Hance Park where we walked over to a concert

By the time we had our event we had filled our complete order of rooms minus a few had 500 attendees at our event and had dinner and lunch and networking drinks at the hotel every day for 4 days bringing so much revenue and traffic to the hotel and the brand
We still ended up spending 25k with Sheraton for the event room lunches for our VIP for two days and our Employee Room Bookings
The District restaurant needs new cook
The food at the breaks was good but our chicken sandwiches for our boxed lunch had no pesto on them that anyone could find despite that being a selling point
Again the construction was disclosed but I did not expect to be having dinner in a hallway
Breakfast was comical with electrical circuits being overloaded and napkins running out in the lounge
Nice bar area food could be better but there are plenty of surrounding restaurants
There is a restaurant and bar as well as a place in the lobby for snacks drinks and coffee
Lobby restaurant bar under construction elevators also limited
